description:
The Federal government stipulates that only men have the right to inherit. So after the death of his husband, Yan Yuchun reluctantly ushered in the new heir- Xavier, the youngest general in the Federation.

After the proposal to marry his daughter and become in-laws was rejected, Yan Yuchun had to whip up a new plan to preserve his property.

Only this time the bait would be himself.>
